vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μᾰλᾰκ-ία,
Ionic dialect -ιη, ἡ, (μαλακός) softness, [Refs 5th c.BC+]“Aër.” 20: hence, of persons, moral weakness, opposed to καρτερία, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 ={κιναιδεία}, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__3 weakliness, sickness, [LXX+NT+5th c.BC+]; μ. σώματος, opposed to ψυχῆς, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__II calmness of the sea, malacia ac tranquillitas, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: calmness of the sea, malacia ac tranquillitas
vocabInfos.mediumDef: calmness of the sea, malacia ac tranquillitas
